entity.name: content
entity.query: SELECT CONCAT('publications-',publications.id) AS identifier, publications.id, publications.title, authors, editors, in_publication AS inPublication, isbn, publication_place AS placePublished, publication_year AS yearPublished, publications.updated, publications.created, publisher, publicationtypes.term AS pubType FROM publications LEFT JOIN publicationtypes ON publications.publication_type = publications.id
